overview.en: RideNodes™ is a virtual currency & smart contract apparatus that aims to realign the interests of Drivers, Riders, & Service Coordinators (collectively referred to as our network participants) who already utilize ride-hailing services (such as Uber, Lyft, Via and even traditional taxi & limousine companies). By leveraging the blockchain, RideNodes™ aims to provide a superior platform not limited to logistics, payments, credential verification, and incident responses, and special emphasis on the safety and the security of BOTH the riders and drivers.
